019package org.jgrapes.webconsole.base;
020
021import java.beans.ConstructorProperties;
022import java.io.BufferedReader;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.io.Reader;
025import java.io.Serializable;
026import java.io.StringWriter;
027import java.net.URL;
028import java.nio.CharBuffer;
029import java.time.Duration;
030import java.time.Instant;
031import java.util.Collection;
032import java.util.Collections;
033import java.util.HashMap;
034import java.util.HashSet;
035import java.util.Iterator;
036import java.util.Locale;
037import java.util.Map;
038import java.util.Map.Entry;
039import java.util.Optional;
040import java.util.ResourceBundle;
041import java.util.Set;
042import java.util.UUID;
043import java.util.WeakHashMap;
044import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
045import java.util.concurrent.Future;
046import java.util.function.Supplier;
047import java.util.stream.Collectors;
048import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
049import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
050import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
051import org.jgrapes.core.Components.Timer;
052import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
053import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
054import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.HandlerDefinition.ChannelReplacements;
055import org.jgrapes.http.Session;
056import org.jgrapes.io.IOSubchannel;
057import org.jgrapes.io.events.Closed;
058import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
059import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest;
060import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
061import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConletDeleted;
062import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConletResourceRequest;
063import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
064import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
065import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletView;
066import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConlet;
067import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequest;
068import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
069import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
070
071/**
072 * Provides a base class for implementing web console components.
073 * In addition to translating events to invocations of abstract
074 * methods, this class manages the state information of a
075 * web console component instance.
076 * 
077 * # Event handling
078 * 
079 * The following diagrams show the events exchanged between
080 * the {@link WebConsole} and a web console component from the 
081 * web console component's perspective. If applicable, they also show 
082 * how the events are translated by the {@link AbstractConlet} to invocations 
083 * of the abstract methods that have to be implemented by the
084 * derived class (the web console component component that provides
085 * a specific web console component type).
086 * 
087 * ## ConsoleReady
088 * 
089 * ![Add web console component type handling](AddConletTypeHandling.svg)
090 * 
091 * From the web console's page point of view, a web console component 
092 * consists of CSS and JavaScript that is added to the console page by
093 * {@link AddConletType} events and HTML that is provided by 
094 * {@link RenderConlet} events (see below). These events must 
095 * therefore be generated by a web console component. With respect to
096 * the firing of the initial {@link AddConletType}, 
097 * the {@link AbstractConlet} does not provide any support. The
098 * handler for the {@link ConsoleReady} must be implemented by
099 * the derived class itself.
100 * 
101 * ## AddConletRequest
102 * 
103 * ![Add web console component handling](AddConletHandling.svg)
104 * 
105 * The {@link AddConletRequest} indicates that a new web console component
106 * instance of a given type should be added to the page. The
107 * {@link AbstractConlet} checks the type requested, and if
108 * it matches, invokes {@link #doAddConlet doAddConlet}. The
109 * derived class generates a new unique web console component id (optionally 
110 * using {@link #generateConletId generateConletId}) 
111 * and a model (state) for the instance. It 
112 * calls {@link #putInSession putInSession} to make the
113 * model known to the {@link AbstractConlet}. Eventually,
114 * it fires the {@link RenderConlet} event and returns a new
115 * {@link ConletTrackingInfo} with the conlet id and the rendered
116 * modes. 
117 * 
118 * The {@link RenderConlet} event provides to the console session
119 * the HTML that represents the web console component on the page.
120 * The HTML may be generated using and thus depending on the web console
121 * component model.
122 * Alternatively, state independent HTML may be provided followed 
123 * by a {@link NotifyConletView} event that updates
124 * the HTML (using JavaScript) on the console page. The latter approach
125 * is preferred if the model changes frequently and updating the
126 * rendered representation is more efficient than providing a new one.
127 * 
128 * ## RenderConletRequest
129 * 
130 * ![Render web console component handling](RenderConletHandling.svg)
131 * 
132 * A {@link RenderConletRequest} event indicates that the web console page
133 * needs the HTML for displaying a web console component. This may be caused
134 * by e.g. a refresh or by requesting a full page view from
135 * the preview.
136 * 
137 * Upon receiving such an event, the {@link AbstractConlet}
138 * checks if it has state information for the web console component id
139 * requested. If so, it invokes {@link #doRenderConlet doRenderConlet}
140 * with the state information. This method has to fire
141 * the {@link RenderConlet} event that provides the HTML to the console.
142 * 
143 * Method {@link #doRenderConlet doRenderConlet} returns the rendered
144 * view mode(s) which are used to updated the conlet tracking information.
145 * 
146 * ## ConletDeleted
147 * 
148 * ![Web console component deleted handling](ConletDeletedHandling.svg)
149 * 
150 * When the {@link AbstractConlet} receives a {@link ConletDeleted},
151 * it updates the information about the shown conlet views. If the
152 * conlet is no longer used in the browser (no views remain),
153 * it deletes the state information from the session. In any case, it
154 * invokes 
155 * {@link #doConletDeleted(ConletDeleted, ConsoleSession, String, Serializable)}
156 * with the state information.
157 * 
158 * ## NotifyConletModel
159 * 
160 * ![Notify web console component model handling](NotifyConletModelHandling.svg)
161 * 
162 * If the web console component display includes input elements, actions 
163 * on these elements may result in {@link NotifyConletModel} events from
164 * the web console page to the web console. When the {@link AbstractConlet}
165 * receives such events, it checks if state information for the 
166 * web console component id exists. If so, it invokes 
167 * {@link #doNotifyConletModel doNotifyConletModel} with the
168 * retrieved information. The web console component usually responds with
169 * a {@link NotifyConletView} event. However, it can also
170 * re-render the complete portelt display.
171 * 
172 * Support for unsolicited updates
173 * -------------------------------
174 * 
175 * In addition, the class provides support for tracking the 
176 * relationship between {@link ConsoleSession}s and the ids 
177 * of web console components displayed in the console session and support for
178 * unsolicited updates.
179 *
180 * @param <S> the type of the web console component state information
181 * 
182 * @startuml AddConletTypeHandling.svg
183 * hide footbox
184 * 
185 * activate WebConsole
186 * WebConsole -> Conlet: ConsoleReady
187 * deactivate WebConsole
188 * activate Conlet
189 * Conlet -> WebConsole: AddConletType 
190 * deactivate Conlet
191 * activate WebConsole
192 * deactivate WebConsole
193 * @enduml 
194 * @startuml AddConletHandling.svg
195 * hide footbox
196 * 
197 * activate WebConsole
198 * WebConsole -> Conlet: AddConletRequest
199 * deactivate WebConsole
200 * activate Conlet
201 * Conlet -> Conlet: doAddConlet
202 * activate Conlet
203 * opt
204 *         Conlet -> Conlet: generateConletId
205 * activate Conlet
206 * deactivate Conlet
207 * end opt
208 * Conlet -> Conlet: putInSession
209 * activate Conlet
210 * deactivate Conlet
211 * Conlet -> WebConsole: RenderConlet
212 * activate WebConsole
213 * deactivate WebConsole
214 * opt 
215 *     Conlet -> WebConsole: NotifyConletView
216 * activate WebConsole
217 * deactivate WebConsole
218 * end opt 
219 * deactivate Conlet
220 * Conlet -> Conlet: trackConlet
221 * activate Conlet
222 * deactivate Conlet
223 * deactivate Conlet
224 * @enduml 
225 * 
226 * @startuml RenderConletHandling.svg
227 * hide footbox
228 * 
229 * activate WebConsole
230 * WebConsole -> Conlet: RenderConletRequest
231 * deactivate WebConsole
232 * activate Conlet
233 * Conlet -> Conlet: doRenderConlet
234 * activate Conlet
235 * Conlet -> WebConsole: RenderConlet 
236 * activate WebConsole
237 * deactivate WebConsole
238 * opt 
239 *     Conlet -> WebConsole: NotifyConletView
240 * activate WebConsole
241 * deactivate WebConsole
242 * end opt 
243 * deactivate Conlet
244 * Conlet -> Conlet: trackConlet.addModes
245 * activate Conlet
246 * deactivate Conlet
247 * deactivate Conlet
248 * @enduml 
249 * 
250 * @startuml NotifyConletModelHandling.svg
251 * hide footbox
252 * 
253 * activate WebConsole
254 * WebConsole -> Conlet: NotifyConletModel
255 * deactivate WebConsole
256 * activate Conlet
257 * Conlet -> Conlet: doNotifyConletModel
258 * activate Conlet
259 * opt
260 *     Conlet -> WebConsole: RenderConlet
261 * end opt 
262 * opt 
263 *     Conlet -> WebConsole: NotifyConletView
264 * end opt 
265 * deactivate Conlet
266 * deactivate Conlet
267 * activate WebConsole
268 * deactivate WebConsole
269 * @enduml 
270 * 
271 * @startuml ConletDeletedHandling.svg
272 * hide footbox
273 * 
274 * activate WebConsole
275 * WebConsole -> Conlet: ConletDeleted
276 * deactivate WebConsole
277 * activate Conlet
278 * Conlet -> Conlet: trackConlet.removeModes
279 * activate Conlet
280 * deactivate Conlet
281 * Conlet -> Conlet: doConletDeleted
282 * activate Conlet
283 * deactivate Conlet
284 * deactivate Conlet
285 * @enduml 
286 */
287@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.TooManyMethods",
288    "PMD.EmptyMethodInAbstractClassShouldBeAbstract", "PMD.GodClass" })
289public abstract class AbstractConlet<S extends Serializable>
290        extends Component {
291
292    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.FieldNamingConventions",
293        "PMD.VariableNamingConventions", "PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap",
294        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
295    private static final Map<Class<?>,
296            Map<Locale, ResourceBundle>> supportedLocales
297                = Collections.synchronizedMap(new WeakHashMap<>());
298    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.FieldNamingConventions",
299        "PMD.VariableNamingConventions", "PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap" })
300    private static final Map<Class<?>,
301            Map<Locale, ResourceBundle>> l10nBundles
302                = Collections.synchronizedMap(new WeakHashMap<>());
303    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.LongVariable")
304    private Map<ConsoleSession,
305            Map<String, ConletTrackingInfo>> conletInfosByConsoleSession;
306    private Duration refreshInterval;
307    private Supplier<Event<?>> refreshEventSupplier;
308    private Timer refreshTimer;
309
310    /**
311     * Creates a new component that listens for new events
312     * on the given channel.
313     * 
314     * @param channel the channel to listen on
315     */
316    public AbstractConlet(Channel channel) {
317        this(channel, null);
318    }
319
320    /**
321     * Like {@link #AbstractConlet(Channel)}, but supports
322     * the specification of channel replacements.
323     *
324     * @param channel the channel to listen on
325     * @param channelReplacements the channel replacements (see
326     * {@link Component})
327     */
328    public AbstractConlet(Channel channel,
329            ChannelReplacements channelReplacements) {
330        super(channel, channelReplacements);
331        conletInfosByConsoleSession
332            = Collections.synchronizedMap(new WeakHashMap<>());
333    }
334
335    /**
336     * If set to a value different from `null` causes an event
337     * from the given supplier to be fired on all tracked web console
338     * sessions periodically.
339     *
340     * @param interval the refresh interval
341     * @param supplier the supplier
342     * @return the web console component for easy chaining
343     */
344    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.LinguisticNaming")
345    public AbstractConlet<S> setPeriodicRefresh(
346            Duration interval, Supplier<Event<?>> supplier) {
347        refreshInterval = interval;
348        refreshEventSupplier = supplier;
349        if (refreshTimer != null) {
350            refreshTimer.cancel();
351            refreshTimer = null;
352        }
353        updateRefresh();
354        return this;
355    }
356
357    private void updateRefresh() {
358        if (refreshInterval == null || conletIdsByConsoleSession().isEmpty()) {
359            // At least one of the prerequisites is missing, terminate
360            if (refreshTimer != null) {
361                refreshTimer.cancel();
362                refreshTimer = null;
363            }
364            return;
365        }
366        if (refreshTimer != null) {
367            // Already running.
368            return;
369        }
370        refreshTimer = Components.schedule(tmr -> {
371            tmr.reschedule(tmr.scheduledFor().plus(refreshInterval));
372            fire(refreshEventSupplier.get(), trackedSessions());
373        }, Instant.now().plus(refreshInterval));
374    }
375
376    /**
377     * Returns the web console component type. The default implementation
378     * returns the class' name.
379     * 
380     * @return the type
381     */
382    protected String type() {
383        return getClass().getName();
384    }
385
386    /**
387     * A default handler for resource requests. Checks that the request
388     * is directed at this web console component, and calls 
389     * {@link #doGetResource}.
390     * 
391     * @param event the resource request event
392     * @param channel the channel that the request was recived on
393     */
394    @Handler
395    public final void onConletResourceRequest(
396            ConletResourceRequest event, IOSubchannel channel) {
397        // For me?
398        if (!event.conletClass().equals(type())) {
399            return;
400        }
401        doGetResource(event, channel);
402    }
403
404    /**
405     * The default implementation searches for a file with the 
406     * requested resource URI in the web console component's class 
407     * path and sets its {@link URL} as result if found.
408     * 
409     * @param event the event. The result will be set to
410     * `true` on success
411     * @param channel the channel
412     */
413    protected void doGetResource(ConletResourceRequest event,
414            IOSubchannel channel) {
415        URL resourceUrl = this.getClass().getResource(
416            event.resourceUri().getPath());
417        if (resourceUrl == null) {
418            return;
419        }
420        event.setResult(new ResourceByUrl(event, resourceUrl));
421        event.stop();
422    }
423
424    /**
425     * Provides a resource bundle for localization.
426     * The default implementation looks up a bundle using the
427     * package name plus "l10n" as base name. Note that the bundle 
428     * returned for a given locale may be the fallback bundle.
429     * 
430     * @return the resource bundle
431     */
432    protected ResourceBundle resourceBundle(Locale locale) {
433        return ResourceBundle.getBundle(
434            getClass().getPackage().getName() + ".l10n", locale,
435            getClass().getClassLoader(),
436            ResourceBundle.Control.getNoFallbackControl(
437                ResourceBundle.Control.FORMAT_DEFAULT));
438    }
439
440    /**
441     * Returns bundles for the given locales. 
442     * 
443     * The default implementation uses {@link #resourceBundle(Locale)} 
444     * to lookup the bundles. The method is guaranteed to return a 
445     * bundle for each requested locale even if it is only the fallback 
446     * bundle. The evaluated results are cached for the conlet class.
447     *
448     * @param toGet the locales to get bundles for
449     * @return the map with locales and bundles
450     */
451    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
452    protected Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> l10nBundles(Set<Locale> toGet) {
453        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
454        Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> result = new HashMap<>();
455        for (Locale locale : toGet) {
456            ResourceBundle bundle;
457            synchronized (l10nBundles) {
458                // Due to the nested computeIfAbsent, it is not sufficient
459                // that l10nBundels is thread safe.
460                bundle = l10nBundles
461                    .computeIfAbsent(getClass(),
462                        cls -> new ConcurrentHashMap<>())
463                    .computeIfAbsent(locale, l -> resourceBundle(locale));
464            }
465            result.put(locale, bundle);
466        }
467        return Collections.unmodifiableMap(result);
468    }
469
470    /**
471     * Provides localizations for the given key for all requested locales.
472     * 
473     * The default implementation uses {@link #l10nBundles(Set)} to obtain
474     * the localizations.
475     *
476     * @param locales the requested locales
477     * @param key the key
478     * @return the result
479     */
480    protected Map<Locale, String> localizations(Set<Locale> locales,
481            String key) {
482        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
483        Map<Locale, String> result = new HashMap<>();
484        Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> bundles = l10nBundles(locales);
485        for (Map.Entry<Locale, ResourceBundle> entry : bundles.entrySet()) {
486            result.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue().getString(key));
487        }
488        return result;
489    }
490
491    /**
492     * Returns the supported locales and the associated bundles.
493     * 
494     * The default implementation invokes {@link #resourceBundle(Locale)}
495     * with all available locales and drops results with fallback bundles.
496     * The evaluated results are cached for the conlet class.
497     *
498     * @return the result
499     */
500    protected Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> supportedLocales() {
501        return supportedLocales.computeIfAbsent(getClass(), cls -> {
502            ResourceBundle.clearCache(cls.getClassLoader());
503            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
504            Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> bundles = new HashMap<>();
505            for (Locale locale : Locale.getAvailableLocales()) {
506                if ("".equals(locale.getLanguage())) {
507                    continue;
508                }
509                ResourceBundle bundle = resourceBundle(locale);
510                if (bundle.getLocale().equals(locale)) {
511                    bundles.put(locale, bundle);
512                }
513            }
514            return bundles;
515        });
516    }
517
518    /**
519     * Generates a new unique web console component id.
520     * 
521     * @return the web console component id
522     */
523    protected String generateConletId() {
524        return UUID.randomUUID().toString();
525    }
526
527    /**
528     * Returns the tracked sessions and conlet ids as map.
529     * 
530     * If you need a particular session's web console component ids, you 
531     * should prefer {@link #conletIds(ConsoleSession)} over calling
532     * this method with `get(consoleSession)` appended.
533     * 
534     * @return the result
535     */
536    protected Map<ConsoleSession, Set<String>> conletIdsByConsoleSession() {
537        return conletInfosByConsoleSession.entrySet().stream()
538            .collect(Collectors.toMap(Entry::getKey,
539                e -> new HashSet<>(e.getValue().keySet())));
540    }
541
542    /**
543     * Returns the tracked sessions. This is effectively
544     * `conletInfosByConsoleSession().keySet()` converted to
545     * an array. This representation is especially useful 
546     * when the web console sessions are used as argument for 
547     * {@link #fire(Event, Channel...)}.
548     *
549     * @return the web console sessions
550     */
551    protected ConsoleSession[] trackedSessions() {
552        Set<ConsoleSession> sessions = new HashSet<>(
553            conletInfosByConsoleSession.keySet());
554        return sessions.toArray(new ConsoleSession[0]);
555    }
556
557    /**
558     * Returns the set of web console component ids associated with the 
559     * console session as a {@link Set}. If no web console components 
560     * have registered yet, an empty set is returned.
561     * 
562     * @param consoleSession the console session
563     * @return the set
564     */
565    protected Set<String> conletIds(ConsoleSession consoleSession) {
566        return new HashSet<>(conletInfosByConsoleSession.getOrDefault(
567            consoleSession, Collections.emptyMap()).keySet());
568    }
569
570    /**
571     * Track the given web console component from the given session. 
572     * This is invoked by 
573     * {@link #onAddConletRequest(AddConletRequest, ConsoleSession)} and
574     * needs only be used if 
575     * {@link #onAddConletRequest(AddConletRequest, ConsoleSession)} 
576     * or {@link #onRenderConletRequest(RenderConletRequest, ConsoleSession)}
577     * is overridden.
578     *
579     * @param consoleSession the web console session
580     * @param conletId the conlet id
581     * @param info the info to be added if untracked. If `null`
582     * a new {@link ConletTrackingInfo} is added.
583     * @return the conlet tracking info
584     */
585    protected ConletTrackingInfo trackConlet(ConsoleSession consoleSession,
586            String conletId, ConletTrackingInfo info) {
587        Map<String, ConletTrackingInfo> infos
588            = conletInfosByConsoleSession.computeIfAbsent(consoleSession,
589                newKey -> new ConcurrentHashMap<>());
590        ConletTrackingInfo result = infos.computeIfAbsent(conletId,
591            key -> Optional.ofNullable(info)
592                .orElse(new ConletTrackingInfo(conletId)));
593        updateRefresh();
594        return result;
595    }
596
597    /**
598     * Puts the given web console component state in the session using the 
599     * {@link #type()} and the given web console component id as keys.
600     * 
601     * @param session the session to use
602     * @param conletId the web console component id
603     * @param conletState the web console component state
604     * @return the portlweb console componentet state
605     */
606    @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
607    protected Serializable putInSession(Session session, String conletId,
608            Serializable conletState) {
609        ((Map<Serializable,
610                Map<Serializable, Map<String, Serializable>>>) (Map<
611                        Serializable, ?>) session)
612                            .computeIfAbsent(AbstractConlet.class,
613                                newKey -> new ConcurrentHashMap<>())
614                            .computeIfAbsent(type(),
615                                newKey -> new ConcurrentHashMap<>())
616                            .put(conletId, conletState);
617        return conletState;
618    }
619
620    /**
621     * Puts the given web console component instance state in the browser
622     * session associated with the channel, using  
623     * {@link #type()} and the web console component id from the model.
624     *
625     * @param session the session to use
626     * @param conletModel the web console component model
627     * @return the web console component model
628     */
629    protected <T extends ConletBaseModel> T putInSession(
630            Session session, T conletModel) {
631        putInSession(session, conletModel.getConletId(), conletModel);
632        return conletModel;
633    }
634
635    /**
636     * Returns the state of this web console component's type 
637     * with the given id from the session.
638     *
639     * @param session the session to use
640     * @param conletId the web console component id
641     * @return the web console component state
642     */
643    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
644    protected Optional<S> stateFromSession(Session session, String conletId) {
645        return Optional.ofNullable(
646            ((Map<Serializable,
647                    Map<Serializable, Map<String, S>>>) (Map<Serializable,
648                            ?>) session)
649                                .computeIfAbsent(AbstractConlet.class,
650                                    newKey -> new HashMap<>())
651                                .computeIfAbsent(type(),
652                                    newKey -> new HashMap<>())
653                                .get(conletId));
654    }
655
656    /**
657     * Returns all web console component states of this web console 
658     * component's type from the session.
659     *
660     * @param channel the channel, used to access the session
661     * @return the states
662     */
663    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
664    protected Collection<S> statesFromSession(IOSubchannel channel) {
665        return channel.associated(Session.class)
666            .map(session -> ((Map<Serializable,
667                    Map<Serializable, Map<String, S>>>) (Map<Serializable,
668                            ?>) session)
669                                .computeIfAbsent(AbstractConlet.class,
670                                    newKey -> new HashMap<>())
671                                .computeIfAbsent(type(),
672                                    newKey -> new HashMap<>())
673                                .values())
674            .orElseThrow(
675                () -> new IllegalStateException("Session is missing."));
676    }
677
678    /**
679     * Removes the web console component state of the 
680     * web console component with the given id from the session. 
681     * 
682     * @param session the session to use
683     * @param conletId the web console component id
684     * @return the removed state if state existed
685     */
686    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
687    protected Optional<S> removeState(Session session, String conletId) {
688        S state = ((Map<Serializable,
689                Map<Serializable, Map<String, S>>>) (Map<Serializable,
690                        ?>) session)
691                            .computeIfAbsent(AbstractConlet.class,
692                                newKey -> new HashMap<>())
693                            .computeIfAbsent(type(), newKey -> new HashMap<>())
694                            .remove(conletId);
695        return Optional.ofNullable(state);
696    }
697
698    /**
699     * Checks if the request applies to this component. If so, stops the event,
700     * and calls {@link #doAddConlet}. 
701     *
702     * @param event the event
703     * @param consoleSession the channel
704     * @throws Exception the exception
705     */
706    @Handler
707    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException",
708        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
709    public final void onAddConletRequest(AddConletRequest event,
710            ConsoleSession consoleSession) throws Exception {
711        if (!event.conletType().equals(type())) {
712            return;
713        }
714        event.stop();
715        ConletTrackingInfo info = doAddConlet(event, consoleSession);
716        event.setResult(info.conletId());
717        trackConlet(consoleSession, info.conletId(), info);
718    }
719
720    /**
721     * Called by {@link #onAddConletRequest} to complete adding the 
722     * web console component. If the web console component has associated 
723     * state, the implementation should
724     * call {@link #putInSession(Session, String, Serializable)} to create
725     * the state and put it in the session.
726     * 
727     * @param event the event
728     * @param consoleSession the channel
729     * @return the tracking info of the new web console component
730     */
731    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
732    protected abstract ConletTrackingInfo doAddConlet(AddConletRequest event,
733            ConsoleSession consoleSession) throws Exception;
734
735    /**
736     * Checks if the request applies to this component. If so, stops 
737     * the event. If the conlet is completely removed from the browser,
738     * removes the web console component state from the 
739     * browser session. In all cases, it calls {@link #doConletDeleted} 
740     * with the state.
741     * 
742     * @param event the event
743     * @param consoleSession the web console session
744     * @throws Exception the exception
745     */
746    @Handler
747    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
748    public final void onConletDeleted(ConletDeleted event,
749            ConsoleSession consoleSession) throws Exception {
750        Optional<S> optConletState = stateFromSession(
751            consoleSession.browserSession(), event.conletId());
752        if (!optConletState.isPresent()) {
753            return;
754        }
755        String conletId = event.conletId();
756        if (event.renderModes().isEmpty()) {
757            removeState(consoleSession.browserSession(), conletId);
758            for (Iterator<Entry<ConsoleSession, Map<String,
759                    ConletTrackingInfo>>> csi = conletInfosByConsoleSession
760                        .entrySet().iterator();
761                    csi.hasNext();) {
762                Map<String, ConletTrackingInfo> infos = csi.next().getValue();
763                infos.remove(conletId);
764                if (infos.isEmpty()) {
765                    csi.remove();
766                }
767            }
768            updateRefresh();
769        } else {
770            trackConlet(consoleSession, conletId, null)
771                .removeModes(event.renderModes());
772        }
773        event.stop();
774        doConletDeleted(event, consoleSession, event.conletId(),
775            optConletState.get());
776    }
777
778    /**
779     * Called by {@link #onConletDeleted} to propagate the event to derived
780     * classes.
781     *
782     * @param event the event
783     * @param channel the channel
784     * @param conletId the web console component id
785     * @param conletState the web console component state
786     * @throws Exception if a problem occurs
787     */
788    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
789    protected void doConletDeleted(ConletDeleted event,
790            ConsoleSession channel, String conletId, S conletState)
791            throws Exception {
792        // May be defined by derived class.
793    }
794
795    /**
796     * Checks if the request applies to this component by calling
797     * {@link #stateFromSession(Session, String)}. If a model
798     * is found, sets the event's result to `true`, stops the event, and 
799     * calls {@link #doRenderConlet} with the state information. 
800     * 
801     * Some web console components that do not persist their models 
802     * between sessions (e.g. because the model only references data 
803     * maintained elsewhere) should override 
804     * {@link #stateFromSession(Session, String)}
805     * in such a way that it creates the requested model if it doesn't 
806     * exist yet.
807     *
808     * @param event the event
809     * @param consoleSession the web console session
810     * @throws Exception the exception
811     */
812    @Handler
813    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
814    public final void onRenderConletRequest(RenderConletRequest event,
815            ConsoleSession consoleSession) throws Exception {
816        Optional<S> optConletState = stateFromSession(
817            consoleSession.browserSession(), event.conletId());
818        if (!optConletState.isPresent()) {
819            return;
820        }
821        event.setResult(true);
822        event.stop();
823        Set<RenderMode> rendered = doRenderConlet(
824            event, consoleSession, event.conletId(), optConletState.get());
825        trackConlet(consoleSession, event.conletId(), null).addModes(rendered);
826    }
827
828    /**
829     * Called by 
830     * {@link #onRenderConletRequest(RenderConletRequest, ConsoleSession)} 
831     * to complete rendering the web console component.
832     *
833     * @param event the event
834     * @param channel the channel
835     * @param conletId the web console component id
836     * @param conletState the web console component state
837     * @return the rendered modes
838     * @throws Exception the exception
839     */
840    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
841    protected abstract Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequest event,
842            ConsoleSession channel, String conletId, S conletState)
843            throws Exception;
844
845    /**
846     * Invokes {@link #doSetLocale(SetLocale, ConsoleSession, String)}
847     * for each web console component in the console session.
848     * 
849     * If the vent has the reload flag set, does nothing.
850     * 
851     * The default implementation fires a 
852     *
853     * @param event the event
854     * @param consoleSession the web console session
855     * @throws Exception the exception
856     */
857    @Handler
858    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
859    public void onSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleSession consoleSession)
860            throws Exception {
861        if (event.reload()) {
862            return;
863        }
864        for (String conletId : conletIds(consoleSession)) {
865            if (!doSetLocale(event, consoleSession, conletId)) {
866                event.forceReload();
867                break;
868            }
869        }
870    }
871
872    /**
873     * Called by {@link #onSetLocale(SetLocale, ConsoleSession)} for
874     * each web console component in the console session. Derived 
875     * classes must send events for updating the representation to 
876     * match the new locale.
877     * 
878     * If the method returns `false` this indicates that the representation 
879     * cannot be updated without reloading the web console page.
880     * 
881     * The default implementation fires a {@link RenderConletRequest}
882     * with tracked render modes (one of or both {@link RenderMode#Preview}
883     * and {@link RenderMode#View}), thus updating the known representations.
884     * (Assuming that "Edit" and "Help" modes are represented with modal 
885     * dialogs and therefore locale changes aren't possible while these are 
886     * open.) 
887     *
888     * @param event the event
889     * @param channel the channel
890     * @param conletId the web console component id
891     * @return true, if the locale could be changed
892     * @throws Exception the exception
893     */
894    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
895    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleSession channel,
896            String conletId) throws Exception {
897        fire(new RenderConletRequest(event.renderSupport(), conletId,
898            trackConlet(channel, conletId, null).renderedAs()),
899            channel);
900        return true;
901    }
902
903    /**
904     * Checks if the request applies to this component by calling
905     * {@link #stateFromSession(Session, String)}. If a model
906     * is found, calls {@link #doNotifyConletModel} with the state 
907     * information. 
908     *
909     * @param event the event
910     * @param channel the channel
911     * @throws Exception the exception
912     */
913    @Handler
914    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
915    public final void onNotifyConletModel(NotifyConletModel event,
916            ConsoleSession channel) throws Exception {
917        Optional<S> optConletState
918            = stateFromSession(channel.browserSession(), event.conletId());
919        if (!optConletState.isPresent()) {
920            return;
921        }
922        doNotifyConletModel(event, channel, optConletState.get());
923    }
924
925    /**
926     * Called by {@link #onNotifyConletModel} to complete handling
927     * the notification. The default implementation does nothing.
928     * 
929     * @param event the event
930     * @param channel the channel
931     * @param conletState the web console component state
932     */
933    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
934    protected void doNotifyConletModel(NotifyConletModel event,
935            ConsoleSession channel, S conletState) throws Exception {
936        // Default is to do nothing.
937    }
938
939    /**
940     * Removes the {@link ConsoleSession} from the set of tracked sessions.
941     * If derived web console components need to perform extra actions when a
942     * console session is closed, they have to override 
943     * {@link #afterOnClosed(Closed, ConsoleSession)}.
944     * 
945     * @param event the closed event
946     * @param consoleSession the web console session
947     */
948    @Handler
949    public final void onClosed(Closed event, ConsoleSession consoleSession) {
950        conletInfosByConsoleSession.remove(consoleSession);
951        updateRefresh();
952        afterOnClosed(event, consoleSession);
953    }
954
955    /**
956     * Invoked by {@link #onClosed(Closed, ConsoleSession)} after
957     * the web console session has been removed from the set of
958     * tracked sessions. The default implementation does
959     * nothing.
960     * 
961     * @param event the closed event
962     * @param consoleSession the web console session
963     */
964    protected void afterOnClosed(Closed event, ConsoleSession consoleSession) {
965        // Default is to do nothing.
966    }
967
968    /**
969     * The information tracked about web console components that are
970     * used by the console. It includes the component's id and the
971     * currently rendered views (only preview and view are tracked,
972     * with "deletable preview" mapped to "preview").
973     */
974    protected static class ConletTrackingInfo {
975        private final String conletId;
976        private final Set<RenderMode> renderedAs;
977
978        /**
979         * Instantiates a new conlet tracking info.
980         *
981         * @param conletId the conlet id
982         */
983        public ConletTrackingInfo(String conletId) {
984            this.conletId = conletId;
985            renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
986        }
987
988        /**
989         * Returns the conlet id.
990         *
991         * @return the id
992         */
993        public String conletId() {
994            return conletId;
995        }
996
997        /**
998         * The render modes current used.
999         *
1000         * @return the render modes
1001         */
1002        public Set<RenderMode> renderedAs() {
1003            return renderedAs;
1004        }
1005
1006        /**
1007         * Adds the given modes.
1008         *
1009         * @param modes the modes
1010         * @return the conlet tracking info
1011         */
1012        public ConletTrackingInfo addModes(Set<RenderMode> modes) {
1013            if (modes.contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
1014                renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Preview);
1015            }
1016            if (modes.contains(RenderMode.View)) {
1017                renderedAs.add(RenderMode.View);
1018            }
1019            return this;
1020        }
1021
1022        /**
1023         * Removes the given modes.
1024         *
1025         * @param modes the modes
1026         * @return the conlet tracking info
1027         */
1028        public ConletTrackingInfo removeModes(Set<RenderMode> modes) {
1029            renderedAs.removeAll(modes);
1030            return this;
1031        }
1032
1033        @Override
1034        public int hashCode() {
1035            return conletId.hashCode();
1036        }
1037
1038        @Override
1039        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
1040            if (this == obj) {
1041                return true;
1042            }
1043            if (obj == null) {
1044                return false;
1045            }
1046            if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
1047                return false;
1048            }
1049            ConletTrackingInfo other = (ConletTrackingInfo) obj;
1050            if (conletId == null) {
1051                if (other.conletId != null) {
1052                    return false;
1053                }
1054            } else if (!conletId.equals(other.conletId)) {
1055                return false;
1056            }
1057            return true;
1058        }
1059    }
1060
1061    /**
1062     * Defines the web console component model following the 
1063     * JavaBean conventions.
1064     * 
1065     * Conlet models should follow these conventions because
1066     * many template engines rely on them and to support serialization
1067     * to portable formats. 
1068     */
1069    @SuppressWarnings("serial")
1070    public static class ConletBaseModel implements Serializable {
1071
1072        protected String conletId;
1073
1074        /**
1075         * Creates a new model with the given type and id.
1076         * 
1077         * @param conletId the web console component id
1078         */
1079        @ConstructorProperties({ "conletId" })
1080        public ConletBaseModel(String conletId) {
1081            this.conletId = conletId;
1082        }
1083
1084        /**
1085         * Returns the web console component id.
1086         * 
1087         * @return the web console component id
1088         */
1089        public String getConletId() {
1090            return conletId;
1091        }
1092
1093        /**
1094         * Hash code.
1095         *
1096         * @return the int
1097         */
1098        /*
1099         * (non-Javadoc)
1100         * 
1101         * @see java.lang.Object#hashCode()
1102         */
1103        @Override
1104        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
1105        public int hashCode() {
1106            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidFinalLocalVariable")
1107            final int prime = 31;
1108            int result = 1;
1109            result = prime * result
1110                + ((conletId == null) ? 0 : conletId.hashCode());
1111            return result;
1112        }
1113
1114        /**
1115         * Two objects are equal if they have equal web console component ids.
1116         * 
1117         * @param obj the other object
1118         * @return the result
1119         */
1120        @Override
1121        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
1122            if (this == obj) {
1123                return true;
1124            }
1125            if (obj == null) {
1126                return false;
1127            }
1128            if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
1129                return false;
1130            }
1131            ConletBaseModel other = (ConletBaseModel) obj;
1132            if (conletId == null) {
1133                if (other.conletId != null) {
1134                    return false;
1135                }
1136            } else if (!conletId.equals(other.conletId)) {
1137                return false;
1138            }
1139            return true;
1140        }
1141    }
1142
1143    /**
1144     * Send to the web console page for adding or updating a complete web 
1145     * console component representation.
1146     */
1147    public static class RenderConletFromReader extends RenderConlet {
1148
1149        private final Future<String> content;
1150
1151        /**
1152         * Creates a new event.
1153         *
1154         * @param request the request
1155         * @param conletType the conlet type
1156         * @param conletId the id of the web console component
1157         * @param contentReader the content reader
1158         */
1159        public RenderConletFromReader(RenderConletRequestBase<?> request,
1160                String conletType, String conletId, Reader contentReader) {
1161            super(conletType, conletId);
1162            // Start to prepare the content immediately and concurrently.
1163            content = request.processedBy().map(pby -> pby.executorService())
1164                .orElse(Components.defaultExecutorService()).submit(() -> {
1165                    StringWriter content = new StringWriter();
1166                    CharBuffer buffer = CharBuffer.allocate(8192);
1167                    try (Reader rdr = new BufferedReader(contentReader)) {
1168                        while (true) {
1169                            if (rdr.read(buffer) < 0) {
1170                                break;
1171                            }
1172                            buffer.flip();
1173                            content.append(buffer);
1174                            buffer.clear();
1175                        }
1176                    } catch (IOException e) {
1177                        throw new IllegalStateException(e);
1178                    }
1179                    return content.toString();
1180                });
1181
1182        }
1183
1184        /**
1185         * Content.
1186         *
1187         * @return the future
1188         */
1189        @Override
1190        public Future<String> content() {
1191            return content;
1192        }
1193    }
1194}
